34.eng-name: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten
34.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح وما يؤكل من الحيوان

hadiths.text: Jabir b. Abdullah reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) sent an expedition to the sea coast and I was one among them. The rest of the hadith is the same with a slight variation of wording that in the hadith transmitted on the authority of Wahb b. Kaisan (the words are):" The army ate out of that (the whale) for eighteen days

chapter.eng-name: Permissibility of dead animals from the sea
